hero.title: Nika amandla iKoparetivu yakho
hero.subtitle: Hloza izinhloso zokuSimama
hero.description: Kulula, kuphephile, futhi kunomthelela—siza ikoparetivu yakho ukuthi ichume esikhathini sedijithali ngenkathi yakha izindlela zokusimama zesikhathi esizayo.

items.title: Ukuhlola kokuSimama
items.description: Hloza izindlela zemvelo, zezenhlalakahle, kanye nezokuphatha ukuze wakhe ikoparetivu esinakekela futhi enomthwalo.

items.title: Izinhlelo zokusebenza
items.description: Landelela inqubekela yakho ngamabhodi eKanban asebenzisanayo, aguqula imininingwane yokuhlola ibe yimisebenzi ephathekayo kanye nentuthuko elinganisekayo.

items.title: Yakhelwe amaKoparetivu
items.description: Yenzelwe ngokukhethekile izinhlangano zamakoparetivu eNingizimu Afrika

items.title: Ukusekela izilimi eziningi
items.description: Itholakala ngesiNgisi, siSwati, isiPutukezi, isiZulu, isiJalimani, kanye nesiFulentshi

items.title: Ikhono lokusebenza ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi
items.description: Isebenza ngokuthembekile noma kuxhumeka kwe-inthanethi kuncane

userGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Womsebenzisi Wezinkampani Ezibambisene
userGuide.subtitle: Umhlahlandlela ophelele wokusebenzisa ipulatifomu yokuhlola ukusimama ye-DGRV

quickStart.title: Ukuqala Okusheshayo
quickStart.step1: 1. 📋 Qala noma uphendule ukuhlolwa kusuka ku-dashboard yakho
quickStart.step5: 5. 📊 Sebenzisa imiphumela ukudala amacebo wesenzo futhi ulandele inqubekela

gettingStarted.title: Ukuqala
content: Siyakwamukela ku-Pulatifomu Yokuhlola Ukusimama ye-DGRV! Le thuluzi iyasiza inkampani yakho ebambisene ukuthi ilinganise futhi ithuthukise imikhuba yayo yokusimama.
I-dashboard yakho inikeza ukufinyelela ekuhloleni, amacebo wesenzo, kanye namathuluzi okulandela inqubekela.
Uma ungumphathi wenhlangano, ungadala ukuhlolwa okusha futhi uphathe amalungu eqembu. Abasebenzisi benhlangano bangaphendula ukuhlolwa futhi balandele inqubekela.

roles.title: Ukuqonda Izindima Zabasebenzisi
content: Umphathi Wenhlangano (org_admin): Angadala ukuhlolwa okusha, aphathe abasebenzisi, futhi abone yonke idatha yenhlangano.
Umsebenzisi Wenhlangano (Org_User): Angaphendula ukuhlolwa okunikezwe, abone imiphumela, futhi aphathe amacebo wesenzo.
Bobabili izindima bangafinyelela ku-dashboard, babone okuthunyelwe, futhi bakhiphe imibiko yenhlangano yabo.

assessments.title: Ukwenza Ukuhlolwa
content: Ukuhlolwa kuhlelwe ngezigaba (isb. Imvelo, Umphakathi, Ukuphatha) ngezibuzo kusigaba ngasinye.
Kumbuzo ngamunye, nikeza: impendulo Yebo/Cha, iphesenti lokugcwalisa (0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%), kanye nencazelo yombhalo eningiliziwe.
Unganamathisela amafayela ukuze usekele izimpendulo zakho (max 1MB ngefayela ngalinye). Sebenzisa i-ayikhon yokunamathisela ukuze engeze amadokhumenti.
Londoloza inqubekela yakho noma nini usebenzisa 'Londoloza Isiqeshana'. Gcwalisa yonke imibuzo esigabeni ngaphambi kokuya esilandelayo.
Uma sekuthunyelwe, ukuhlolwa kudlula inqubo yokubuyekezwa ngaphambi kokuvunywa kokugcina.

actionPlans.title: Ukuphatha Amacebo Wesenzo
content: Amacebo wesenzo akusiza ukuthi ulandele imisebenzi yokuthuthukisa esekelwe ezindululweni zokuhlolwa.
Sebenzisa ibhodi ye-Kanban ukuze uhambise imisebenzi ngamazinga: Okwenziwayo → Kwenziwayo → Kwenziwe → Kuvunyiwe.
Engeza imisebenzi emisha, bheka izikhathi, futhi unikeze amalungu eqembu ukuze ulandele inqubekela ngempumelelo.
Ukuvuselelwa okuvamile kwecebo lakho lesenzo kubonisa imizamo yokuthuthukisa okuqhubekayo.
Khipha amacebo wesenzo ukuze wabelane ng inqubekela nababambiqhaza kanye nokuphatha.

viewingResults.title: Ukubona Imiphumela Yokuhlolwa
content: Finyelela konke okuthunyelwe kwakho nge-'Bona Ukuhlolwa' ku-dashboard.
Landela isimo sokuthunyelwa: Kusalindele Ukubuyekezwa → Kuyabuyekezwa → Kuvunyiwe/Kunqatshiwe/Kuceliwe Ukubuyekezwa.
Bona impendulo eningiliziwe kanye nezindululo zokubuyekezwa ukuze uqonde izindawo zokuthuthukisa.
Qhathanisa imiphumela ngamahora ahlukene wokuhlolwa ukuze ulandele inqubekela yenkampani yakho ebambisene.
Sebenzisa ukubukeka kokuthunyelwe ukuze ubuyekezwe izimpendulo zakho kanye namadokhumenti asekelayo.

creatingAssessments.title: Ukudala Ukuhlolwa (Abaphathi Kuphela)
content: Abaphathi benhlangano bangaqala amasikeli amasha wokuhlolwa wenkampani yabo ebambisene.
Chofoza 'Qala Ukuhlola Ukusimama' ukuze udale isiqeshana esisha sokuhlolwa.
Yabelana nge-ID yokuhlolwa namalungu eqembu ukuze bakwazi ukufaka isandla ezigabeni ezahlukene.
Qapha inqubekela futhi uqinisekise ukuthi zonke izigaba zigcwalisiwe ngaphambi kokuthunyelwa kokugcina.
Ungathumeli ukuhlolwa kuphela lapho zonke izigaba ezidingekayo zigcwalisiwe ngokuphelele.

userManagement.title: Ukuphatha Amalungu Eqembu (Abaphathi Kuphela)
content: Abaphathi benhlangano bangangeza futhi baphathe amalungu eqembu nge-'Phatha Abasebenzisi'.
Mema abasebenzisi abasha nge-imeyili futhi unikeze izindima ezifanele esekelwe izibopho zabo.
Nikeza abasebenzisi ukufinyelela kuzigaba ukuze bakwazi ukufaka isandla ezindaweni ezithile zokuhlolwa.
Susa abasebenzisi abangasadingi ukufinyelela ukuze ugcine ukuphepha kanye nokuthembeka kwedatha.
Buyekezwa ngokuvamile izimvume zabasebenzisi ukuze uqinisekise amazinga okufinyelela afanele.

reportsExports.title: Imibiko Nokukhipha
content: Khipha imibiko yokuhlolwa ngefomethi ye-PDF ukuze wabelane nababambiqhaza kanye namabhodi.
Sebenzisa ukukhipha kwe-CSV ukuze uhlaziywe idatha futhi ulandelele imikhuba ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
Landa amadokhumenti e-Word ukuze wenze ubhalo oluningiliziwe kanye nezinjongo zemibiko.
Ukukhiqizwa okuvamile kwemibiko kusiza ekuboniseni imizamo yokuthuthukisa okuqhubekayo.
Yabelana ngemibiko namalungu kanye nababambiqhaza ukuze ugcine ukubonakala.

bestPractices.title: Imikhuba Emihle Yezinkampani Ezibambisene
content: Bandakanya amalungu ahlukene eqembu ekuhloleni ukuze uthole imibono ephelele ngemikhuba yokusimama.
Nikeza izimpendulo ezininingiliziwe, eziqotho ngezibonelo ezithile kanye nobhalo olusekelayo.
Sebenzisa imiphumela yokuhlolwa ukuze udale amacebo wesenzo aqinisekile, afezekisekayo wokuthuthukisa.
Amasikeli avamile wokuhlolwa (onyakeni noma isigamu sonyaka) asiza ekulandeleni inqubekela nokugcina umfutho.
Gubha ukuthuthukisa futhi yabelana ngempumelelo namalungu akho enkampani ebambisene kanye nomphakathi.

troubleshooting.title: Izinkinga Ezivamile Nezixazululo
content: Awukwazi ukufinyelela ekuhloleni: Hlola nomphathi wenhlangano yakho mayelana nokunikezwa kwezindima kanye nokufinyelela kuzigaba.
Ukuhlolwa akugcini: Qinisekisa ukuthi ugcwalisa zonke izinkambu ezidingekayo (Yebo/Cha, iphesenti kanye nencazelo yombhalo).
Izinkinga zokulayisha amafayela: Amafayela kufanele abe ngaphansi kuka-1MB. Zama ukunciphisa usayizi wefayela noma usebenzise amafomethi ahlukene.
Awukwazi ukubona okuthunyelwe kwamanye amaqembu: Abaphathi benhlangano kuphela abangabona konke okuthunyelwe.
Izigaba zokuhlolwa ezingekho: Xhumana nomphathi wakho ukuze ahlole ukunikezwa kwezigaba yenhlangano yakho.

duringAssessment.title: Ngesikhathi Sokuhlolwa:
items: • Yiba qotho futhi ube ngokucacile ezimpendulweni

needHelp.title: Udinga Usizo?
needHelp.description: Uma udinga usizo noma unemibuzo mayelana nokusebenzisa ipulatifomu:
needHelp.contactAdmin: 💬 Xhumana nomphathi wenhlangano yakho ngemibuzo ethile yendima

adminGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Womphathi We-Pulatifomu ye-DGRV
adminGuide.subtitle: Umhlahlandlela ophelele wokuphatha ipulatifomu yokuhlola ukusimama ye-DGRV

quickStart.title: Ukuqala Okusheshayo
quickStart.step5: 5. 🎯 Sekela izinkampani ezibambisene ohambweni lwazo lokusimama

overview.title: Ukuqonda Ipulatifomu
content: Ipulatifomu Yokuhlola Ukusimama ye-DGRV yakhelwe ukusiza izinkampani ezibambisene kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi zilinganise futhi zithuthukise imikhuba yazo yokusimama.
Njengomphathi, unokufinyelela kumathuluzi aphelele wokuphatha izinkampani, abasebenzisi, okuqukethwe kokuhlolwa, kanye nokubuyekezwa kokuthunyelwe.
Ipulatifomu isekela izilimi eziningi futhi isebenza ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi ukuze ihambisane nezinkinga ezahlukene zokuxhumana esifundeni.

organizations.title: Ukuphatha Izinkampani
content: Engeza izinkampani ezibambisene ezintsha epulatifomu ngezaziso zazo eziyisisekelo kanye nezilungiselelo zedomaini.
Hlela izilungiselelo ezithile zenhlangano futhi uphathe ukufinyelela kwabasebenzisi kuzinkampani ezibambisene ngayinye.
Qapha umsebenzi wenhlangano futhi uqinisekise ukuhlukaniswa okufanele kwedatha phakathi kwezinkampani ezibambisene ezahlukene.
Gcina noma ususe izinkampani ezingasasebenzi kuyilapho ugcina idatha yazo yomlando.

users.title: Ukuphatha Abasebenzisi
content: Dala futhi uphathe ama-akhawunti abasebenzisi kuzo zonke izinkampani nokunikezwa kwezindima ezifanele.
Nikeza abasebenzisi izinkampani ezithile futhi uhlele izimvume zabo zokufinyelela.
Qapha umsebenzi womsebenzisi futhi uphathe isimo sokuqinisekiswa kwe-akhawunti.
Qinisekisa ukuphepha okufanele ngokubuyekezwa ngokuvamile kokufinyelela kwabasebenzisi nokususa ama-akhawunti angasebenzi.

categories.title: Ukuphatha Izigaba Zokuhlolwa
content: Hlela izigaba zokuhlolwa ezihambisana nemikhuba emihle yokusimama kanye nezidingo zendawo.
Beka izisindo ezifanele kusigaba ngasinye ukuze uqinisekise amaphuzu okuhlolwa alinganile.
Hlela izigaba ngokulandelana okunengqondo kokubonisa ukuze uthole ulwazi lomsebenzisi oluhle.
Buyekezwa futhi uvuselele izigaba ngokuvamile esekelwe impendulo kanye namazinga okuvuselelwa yokusimama.

questions.title: Ukuphatha Imibuzo Yokuhlolwa
content: Dala imibuzo ephelele ngaphakathi kusigaba ngasinye ukuze uhlole ngokuphelele imikhuba yokusimama.
Nikeza imibuzo ngezilimi eziningi ukuze usekele imiphakathi yezinkampani ezibambisene ehlukene.
Beka izisindo kanye nokulandelana kokubonisa okufanele kwemibuzo ngaphakathi kusigaba ngasinye.
Buyekezwa futhi uvuselele imibuzo ngokuvamile esekelwe imiphumela yokuhlolwa kanye nempendulo yababambiqhaza.

reviews.title: Ukubuyekezwa Kokuhlolwa
content: Buyekezwa ngokuphelele ukuhlolwa okuthunyelwe, ucabangele amaphuzu ezinga kanye nezimpendulo zekhwalithi.
Nikeza impendulo eyakhiwe kanye nezindululo ezithile zokuthuthukisa.
Sebenzisa izindululo ezivamile ukuze uqinisekise ukuvumelana kuzo zonke izihlolo.
Vuma, nqatsha, noma ucele ukubuyekezwa esekelwe ikhwalithi kanye nokugcwalisa kokuhlolwa.

recommendations.title: Izindululo Ezivamile
content: Dala amamodeli ezindululo azisebenzisekayo ezisekelwe ezimo ezivamile zokuhlolwa kanye nezindawo zokuthuthukisa.
Gcina umtapo wezindululo zekhwalithi ephezulu ezingasetshenziswa kuzinkampani ezibambisene ezahlukene.
Vuselela izindululo ngokuvamile esekelwe imikhuba emihle kanye namasu wokuthuthukisa aphumelelayo.
Qinisekisa ukuthi izindululo ziyasebenza futhi zifezekisekayo kuzinkampani ezibambisene ezahlukene ngosayizi kanye nemithombo.

systemHealth.title: Impilo Nokusebenza Kwesistimu
content: Qapha ngokuvamile ukusebenza kwepulatifomu, impilo yedatha, kanye nezikhathi zokuphendula ze-API.
Buyekezwa isimo seqe lokuhambisana futhi uqinisekise ukuthi ukuhambisana kwedatha kusebenza kahle.
Khipha imibiko yesistimu kanye namalogi wokuhlola ukuze wenze ukuhambisana nokuxazulula izinkinga.
Gcina ama-backup avamile futhi uqinisekise ukuphepha kwedatha kuzo zonke izingxenye zepulatifomu.

support.title: Ukusekela Izinkampani Ezibambisene
content: Nikeza isiqondiso kuzinkampani ezibambisene mayelana nokusebenzisa ipulatifomu ngempumelelo ngezinjongo zazo zokusimama.
Nikeza ukuqeqeshwa kanye nemithombo yokusekela ukusiza izinkampani ukuthi zikhulise inani lokuhlolwa kwazo.
Qapha imikhuba yokuhlolwa futhi ubone amathuba okuthuthukisa ipulatifomu.
Akha ubudlelwane nabaholi bezinkampani ezibambisene ukuze uqonde izidingo kanye nezinkinga zabo ezihlukile.

regularReviews.title: Ukubuyekezwa Okuvamile:
items: • Buyekezwa ukuhlolwa okusalindele okungenani ngesonto ngalinye
• Qapha imethrikhi yempilo kanye nokusebenza kwesistimu
• Vuselela izigaba kanye imibuzo esekelwe impendulo
• Gcina ukuxhumana okuvamile nabaholi bezinkampani ezibambisene

qualityAssurance.title: Ukuqinisekisa Ikhwalithi:
items: • Qinisekisa amazinga avumelene wokubuyekezwa kuzo zonke izihlolo
• Nikeza impendulo eningiliziwe, esebenzisekayo kuzinkampani ezibambisene
• Yenza ama-backup avamile wedatha kanye nezilungiselelo zesistimu

contactInfo.title: Usizo Lokuphatha
contactInfo.description: Ngosizo lobuchwepheshe noma imibuzo yokuphatha ipulatifomu:
